raspuns3: All works to which no exclusive intellectual property rights apply.
raspuns4: Content for which the copyright term has expired.
raspuns corect: All works to which no exclusive intellectual property rights apply.

intrebare?: By owning a musical recording (on CD for example), does it allow you to make copies and sell them?
raspuns1: No, but you are allowed to distribute it free of cost.
raspuns2: Yes, because you paid for the recording.
raspuns3: Yes, because copyright adhering to a work is the same as ownership of a particular copy of that work.
raspuns4: No. Copyingis allowed only if it can be justified by an exemption granted in the law.
raspuns corect: No. Copyingis allowed only if it can be justified by an exemption granted in the law.

intrebare?: Which of the following are considered “works made for hire”?
raspuns2: Works for which the copyright has been transferred.
raspuns3: Works created by an employee, within the scope of employment.
raspuns4: Works in the public domain, that people can use freely.
raspuns corect: Works created by an employee, within the scope of employment.
